title: MYS Recruiting
body:
Hey guys, I'm currently in the process of creating a ranked team which will be looking to enter tournaments and eventually push to try and get into the OCS.
We are looking for diamond 3+ players however we are willing to make exceptions to players who show the willingness to learn and improve and to those who have reached a high tier and are just in a bit of a slump (we all understand that). If you are interested and meet the following requirements please Add "MYS lokeN" in game i believe my friend list is full so i try remove some people

Requirements
- Access and use to a Mic and skype
- Willingness to learn and adapt
- Willing to develop as a player
- Seeking to play LoL at a competitive level
- Attendance of practice/tournaments throughout the week

Preferred
- Diamond 3+
- Fluent and clear communication (English)
- Competitive Experience

replies.body:
How many accounts do you have?

This post has been copy pasted and I know who the last one to use it was.
Can you add me back, I know you have a full friends list :P

hey if your willing to give me a chance i hope youll find me acceptable my main account is bronze but I do play regularly on a diamond acc and find that I don't do the worst and find myself winning lane half the time if interested ign is HAppY101
